column2: Immigration is pay-your-way, allowing only wealthy individuals into the country.
Strict standards are applied to immigrants, often only allowing those from a similar culture.
The government sets quotas and accepts only educated immigrants.
Immigrantion of all peoples around the globe is accepted.
Adult males age 18 through 21 are drafted for one year.
Adult males under age 25 are drafted for two years.
Adult males under age 30 are drafted for four years.
Adult males capable of fighting are drafted by requirement.
Racism is normal and minorities are constrained by blatant legal requirements, relegating them to second-class status.

column1: jim_crow_desc;"Jim Crow" laws, laws that target and act against minorities without explicitly mentioning them, are instituted in place of overtly racist policies.

column2: Legislation targeting minorities is theoretically illegal," but de facto racism and segregation exist in many facets of society under so-called ""separate but equal"" doctrine.
column19:
,
protected;Protected;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
protected_l;Protected;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
protected_desc;Minorities are specially protected groups under the law.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
pollution;Pollution Control;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_controls;No Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_controls_l;No Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_controls_desc;There is no regulation of pollution whatsoever.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
trinket_envir;Minor Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
trinket_envir_l;Minor Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
trinket_envir_desc;Toxic waste can't be dumped straight into food.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
low_envir;Acceptable Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
low_envir_l;Acceptable Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
low_envir_desc;Air emissions and toxic waste dumping are regulated.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
acceptable_envir;Good Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
acceptable_envir_l;Good Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
acceptable_envir_desc;Most pollutants that could cause a threat to public health are heavily regulated.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
good_envir;Strict Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
good_envir_l;Strict Regulations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
good_envir_desc;The dumping or emissions of all dangerous substances are strictly controlled, and violation of pollution laws carries hefty penalties.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,
child_labor;Child Labor Laws;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_legal;Child Labor Legal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_legal_l;Child Labor Legal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_legal_desc;No child labor regulation exists.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_restricted;Child Labor Restricted;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_restricted_l;Child Labor Restricted;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_restricted_desc;Children cannot work in certain dangerous professions.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_illegal;Child Labor Illegal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_illegal_l;Child Labor Illegal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
child_labor_illegal_desc;Child Labor is viewed as immoral and is illegal.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
arts_endowment;Arts Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_endowment;No Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_endowment_l;No Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_endowment_desc;The arts are privated funded.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
small_endowment;Small Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
small_endowment_l;Small Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
small_endowment_desc;The government provides a trinket sum for the arts.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
medium_endowment;Medium Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
medium_endowment_l;Medium Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
medium_endowment_desc;Artists are moderately subsidized by the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
large_endowment;Large Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
large_endowment_l;Large Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
large_endowment_desc;Artists are heavily supported by the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
massive_endowment;Massive Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
massive_endowment_l;Massive Endowment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
massive_endowment_desc;There's a museum on every street corner.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
trial_law;Justice System;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_trials;No Trials;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_trials_l;No Trials;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_trials_desc;The government sentences prisoners without trials.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
group_trials;Group Trials;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
group_trials_l;Group Trials;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
group_trials_desc;The accused are tried in groups in nominal and often unfair trials.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
tribunals;Tribunals;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
tribunals_l;Tribunals;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
tribunals_desc;The accused are tried by a tribunal of judges without the right to a jury.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
trial_by_jury;Trial By Jury;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
trial_by_jury_l;Trial By Jury;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
trial_by_jury_desc;An accused individual is given the right to a trial by an impartial jury of his peers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
debt_law;Debtor System;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
serfdom;Serfdom;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
serfdom_l;Serfdom;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
serfdom_desc;Serfs are essentially owned by the land and forced to work the fields under a feudal system.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
peonage;Peonage;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
peonage_l;Peonage;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
peonage_desc;Peonage is a debt system under which the debtor is forced to work off his debt. This often leads to a perpetual cycle of involuntary labor called peonage.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
debtors_prisons;Debtor's Prisons;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
debtors_prisons_l;Debtor's Prisons;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
debtors_prisons_desc;Debtors are confined to jail until such time as their debt is resolved.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
bankruptcy;Bankruptcy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
bankruptcy_l;Bankruptcy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
bankruptcy_desc;Debtors are allowed to declare bankruptcy and have their previous debts declared null and void.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
patent_law;Patent Law;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_patents;No Patents;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_patents_l;No Patents;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
no_patents_desc;There is no patent law.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
special_patents;Special Patents Only;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
special_patents_l;Special Patents Only;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
special_patents_desc;Patents are only granted by special act of the legislature or executive.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
patent_office;Patent Office;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
patent_office_l;Patent Office;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
patent_office_desc;The government has opened an office to manage the patenting of inventions.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
penal_system;Penal System;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
capital_punishment;Capital Punishment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
capital_punishment_l;Capital Punishment;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
capital_punishment_desc;Convicts are killed for relatively minor crimes.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
transportation;Transportation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
transportation_l;Transportation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
transportation_desc;Prisoners are exported to the nation's colonial holdings to form penal colonies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
incarceration;Incarceration;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
incarceration_l;Incarceration;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
incarceration_desc;Convicts are imprisoned with the intent of removing undesirables from society.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
rehabilitation;Rehabilitation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
rehabilitation_l;Rehabilitation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
rehabilitation_desc;Convicts are imprisoned with the intent of reforming them and reintroducing them into society.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;,,
residency_only;Only people of your nation's primary and accepted cultures are allowed the vote.;Seule la population de la culture principale et de la culture acceptée de votre nation est autorisée à voter.;Nur Angehörige der Primärkultur und der akzeptierten Kulturen unserer Nation dürfen wählen.;;Solo puede votar la población de la cultura principal y de las culturas aceptadas de tu nación.;;;;;;;;;x;,,
